tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_accommodations (
    accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_name VARCHAR(255),
    accommodation_type VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    available_units INT,
    booked_units INT
);

CREATE TABLE Villas (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name TEXT NOT NULL,
	location TEXT NOT NULL,
	price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
	bedrooms INT NOT NULL,
	bathrooms INT NOT NULL,
	available BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE
);

CREATE TABLE Resorts (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name TEXT NOT NULL,
	location TEXT NOT NULL,
	rating FLOAT,
	price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
	available_rooms INT NOT NULL,
	total_rooms INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Villas (
    villa_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    villa_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Resorts (
    resort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resort_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    rating DECIMAL(2, 1),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE PrivateIslands (
    island_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    island_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    owner VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE villas (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    price DECIMAL,
    bedrooms INT,
    bathrooms INT
)

CREATE TABLE resorts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    rating INT,
    rooms INT,
    amenities TEXT[]
)

CREATE TABLE private_islands (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    price DECIMAL,
    size_acres DECIMAL,
    available BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_id UUID,
    booking_date DATE,
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    guest_name TEXT,
    total_price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE villas (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    rooms INTEGER NOT NULL,
    rate DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    availability BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE resorts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    rooms INTEGER NOT NULL,
    rating DECIMAL(3, 1) NOT NULL,
    has_spa BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE islands (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    size_acres INTEGER NOT NULL,
    privacy_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    availability BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    booking_date DATE NOT NULL,
    guest_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
